word: Friday evening at seven o'clock I spoke about three-quarters of an hour from the text, “Come unto me, all ye that labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.” At eight o'clock Eld. G. spoke in the room above. Eld. Bourdeau attended, also M. K. White, who took short-hand notes. I did not go, although Eld. G. thought I was present, and told the people so, which statement, however, he corrected at the next meeting.
